mapper.insert: insert into poll values((select nvl(max(poll_no),0)+1 from poll),#{poll_title},#{poll_start},#{poll_end},#{poll_content},default,#{emp_no},#{poll_writer})
insert into poll_option values((select nvl(max(to_number(option_no)),0)+1 from poll_option),#{option_val},(select poll_no from(select * from poll order by poll_date desc)where rownum=1))
mapper.select:
select to_number(poll_no) poll_no, poll_title, poll_content, poll_writer, substr(replace(poll_start,'-','/'),1,10)||'~'||substr(replace(poll_end,'-','/'),1,10) poll_time, to_char(poll_Date,'YYYY/MM/DD') poll_date from poll where 1=1
and poll_title like '%' || #{text} || '%'
and poll_writer like '%' || #{text} || '%'
order by to_number(poll_no)
